actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide assistance to States for the purpose of restoring the water quality and biological integrity of small lakes, and for other purposes.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Small Lakes Restoration Act of 1992 - Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to States to: (1) carry out specified procedures to restore water quality and biological integrity of small lakes; and (2) assist local entities in obtaining information to demonstrate their need for assistance for lake water quality assessment activities. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide assistance to States for the purpose of restoring the water quality and biological integrity of small lakes, and for other purposes.
